name: Cenk The Chopper
storyline:
In the 21st century, an unknown "parasite" has spread rampantly throughout the world, contorting humans and animals into sick mutations.
You play as Cenk, one of the last remaining people on Earth, fighting your way through armageddon in a war you're partly responsible for.
summary: Cenk The Chopper is a fast paced hack-and-slash game. Fight through hordes of mutants and robots in a world you've made go to hell. Chop 'em up everything you see till the end of it.
